title: 7.2.8 Write scanner tests with LocalStack
body:
## Parent Issue
#30 - 7.2 Security Scanner Engine

## Objective
Write integration tests using LocalStack for AWS service mocking.

## Test Coverage
- S3 scanner rules
- EC2 scanner rules
- RDS scanner rules
- IAM scanner rules
- Orchestrator flow

## LocalStack Setup
```yaml
localstack:
  image: localstack/localstack:latest
  environment:
    - SERVICES=s3,ec2,rds,iam,sts
```

## Files to Create
- `tests/scanners/test_s3_scanner.py`
- `tests/scanners/test_ec2_scanner.py`
- `tests/scanners/test_orchestrator.py`

## Estimated Time: 3 hours
